author: tobiwo
content: Just for curiosity, what is the impact of this report? I didn't read it fully yet but the authors state for example that the `Base Reward Factor` should be doubled at least. If I got it correctly the paper was supported by Ethereum Foundation and a lot of indivduals so I guess it is taken seriously. Is it realistic that specs could change before launch of phase 0 e.g. the change of the `Base Reward Factor`?

author: _0xuser
content: <@!710132892197453824> I don't think that specs should change before Phase 0. Even if we all agree that doubling that would be beneficial, it can wait until later hard-forks. The economic incentives of POS are not so critical in phase 0.

author: tobiwo
content: <@!413635991233101825> Ok, thanks for the clarification. Will read the report in more depth so I get a better understanding of probable implications.
